{layout:"default",data:[{page:{id:ajF,title:"Privacy Policy",slug:"privacypolicy",published_at:"2021-08-02T09:30:41.000Z",created_at:"2021-08-02T09:20:27.000Z",updated_at:"2023-04-21T07:44:30.000Z",locale:bd,content:"# **PLAION Privacy Policy**\n\nAug 2022\n\nThis Privacy Policy applies to this website and all other products, services and games (collectively \"the **Services**\") of PLAION GmbH, Embracer Platz 1, 6604 Hoefen, Austria and its subsidiaries (\" **PLAION**\").\n\nThis Privacy Policy shall explain how PLAION collects and uses personal and non-personal information when you use our services.\n\nPLAION is serious about protecting users' privacy and personal data. Our data protection practices comply with the legal regulations of the respective country of residence and the EU General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR). We process your data only for the purposes described herein. We will only collect the information we need to provide our services to you and to pursue our legitimate interests. We shall only send you advertising or share your information with third parties if legally allowed to do so or with your explicit consent . Furthermore, we process your data if we are obliged to do so by law.\n\nWe ensure that the law and this Privacy Policy are respected by us, our employees and external service providers who work or otherwise carry out services for us. For this we have taken appropriate technical and organizational measures, which correspond to the state of the art (more information under **Security of data** ).\n\nIf you have further questions or comments regarding privacy or to assert your legal rights, please contact PLAION's **Data Protection Officer**\n\nMr. Yao Zhou\n\nto reach below\n\nPLAION GmbH\n\nLochhamer Str. 9\n\nD-82152 Planegg\n\nGermany\n\nTel .: +49 (0) 89 24 24 5 235\n\nE-Mail: dpo@plaion.com\n\nPLEASE READ THE FOLLOWING PRIVACY POLICY FOR INFORMATION REGARDING THE COLLECTION, USE AND DISTRIBUTION OF PERSONAL DATA CAREFULLY WHEN YOU USE ANY ONLINE OR OFFLINE GAME, PRODUCT, SERVICE OR WEBSITE FROM PLAION OR REGISTER FOR ANY PLAION ACCOUNT.\n\n# A.What types of data do we collect?\n\nWhat data PLAION collects depends on the Services you use. We collect personal as well as non-personal data.\n\n## B.Personal Data\n\nPersonal Data means any information relating to an identified or identifiable natural person. Personal Data is one that identifies you directly or indirectly (also in conjunction with other data) and that can be used to contact you online or offline.\n\nExamples of personal data are: Name, address, phone number, email address, user ID, IP address, location, payment information (credit card number, bank details).\n\n## C.Non-personal Information\n\nNon-personal data cannot be used to identify or contact you. We may collect and store information locally on your device, using mechanisms like cookies, browser web storage (including HTML 5) and application data caches when you use our website (see below for details).\n\n# D.How does PLAION collect Personal Data?\n\nThe information that you provide directly to us will be apparent from the context in which you provide the data. In particular, we collect data as follows:\n\n1.\n## Games\n\nWhen you participate in online multiplayer games, your game-related profile information, game data, and stats are public. You can interact with your teammates in a variety of ways. We log the game data to ensure the stability and security of our systems, technical improvement of our games and for backup purposes. Personal Data can also be stored in this process. We have a legitimate interest in this pursuant to Art. 6 para. 1 lit. f GDPR. These data are collected only for the purposes stated above and will not be passed on to third parties.\n\nPLAION and its partners may collect non-personal data about your use of online, offline and mobile games and other services in the course of game play and software usage (on PC, mobile and console platforms). The collected data may include feature usage, game play statistics and scores, user rankings and click paths (collectively \" **Telemetry**\"). You can find further information on the data collection in the privacy policy of the respective game or service.\n\nIn order to use certain Services, anonymous Telemetry data must be linked to Personal Data such as your user account. Such linking only takes place if and to the extent that you register an account and link a certain game or software to it.\n\nWe collect information about which games are played, information about the play time and which advertisements or links are clicked on. Personal identification is based on the data stored in the cookie, provided that you have consented to the storage of cookies.\n\nFor more information see **Cookies \u002F Pixels**.\n\n### Social Media\n\nMany of our games offer the option to connect to your social media account in-game (e.g. Facebook, Xbox Live, Sony Playstation Network, Apple Game Center, etc.) to play with your friends, find new friends, or to share and compare scores. In these cases, the respective platform collects and uses your Personal Data. PLAION has no influence on the processing. Please read the privacy policy of the platforms carefully.\n\n## B.Websites\n\n### Log file data\n\nWhen you visit our websites, access data is recorded in the log file on our servers. We record: Internet protocol, address \u002F IP address, page from which the file was requested, date, time, browser type and operating system, page visited, data transfer, access status (file transfer, file not found, etc.).\n\nWe use the log files to ensure the functionality of the website, to monitor traffic on our websites, to resolve technical issues, and to generate statistics that help us tailor our services to your needs. This is our legitimate interest pursuant to Art. 6 para. 1 lit. f GDPR.\n\nWe do not store this data together with other Personal Data. If it comes to an abuse of our websites, we can block IP addresses, if necessary. The data is stored only for a limited period of time and only for as long as necessary to ensure the safety and functionality of our websites.\n\n### Cookies \u002F Pixels\n\nPLAION uses cookies and similar technologies to\n\n- to offer our Services;\n- to ensure that our websites function properly;\n- to further develop our Services;\n- learn more about our users and their interests;\n- and to make interesting offers and inform about our Services.\n\nCookies are small files that are used in your internet browser to track movements within web pages and to allow analysis of web page usage. We may connect cookie information with Personal Data.\n\n#### Technically necessary cookies\n\nThe purpose of using technically necessary cookies is to facilitate the use of websites. Cookies store, for example, which items you have selected when buying in our shop and stores them in your shopping cart. We also use cookies to save language settings or to remember search requests.\n\nThe processing of Personal Data using Cookies and similar tracking technologies serves our legitimate interest and is based on Art. 6 para. 1 lit. f GDPR.\n\n#### Analysis, tracking and advertising cookies\n\nPLAION uses its own metrics analysis tools and other analytic technologies when you use our online products and services or play our games on your PC, console and mobile device. These data are anonymous and not personal.\n\nThe use of the analysis cookies is for the purpose of improving the quality and content of our websites and Services. Through analysis cookies we learn how the website and our Services are used and so we can constantly optimize our offer for you. We also use Cookies to show you content that suits your interests and to monitor the website. Our pages access external ad companies whose ads are shown. These ads contain cookies. Cookies posted via banner advertising are used by our advertising companies and PLAION has no access to this information.\n\nYou can restrict, deactivate and delete the use of cookies in your browser settings at any time (see **Restricting \u002F Deactivating cookies** ).\n\nWe set this type of cookies only with your prior consent, Art. 6 para. 1 lit. a GDPR. When you visit our website for the first time, you can give or refuse your consent via a tool (consent tool). Here you will also find detailed information about the cookies we use.\n\n### Third party cookies\n\n#### Third party advertising services\n\nOur websites contain third party advertisements and interactive links to third party websites. The third-party providers collect data about your online activities, such as the websites you visit, the automatic transmission of your IP address and the use of cookies. In these cases, no link is created between this information and your name, address, telephone number or e-mail address. We have no influence on the content and design of external websites and their respective links. The data processing by these third parties is therefore not covered by this Privacy Policy. The responsible providers are solely responsible for the content and design of these websites and for compliance with the provisions of the data protection acts. For more information please refer to the privacy policies of such third party websites.\n\nWe only set these types of cookies with your prior consent (see **Analysis, tracking and advertising cookies** ).\n\nYou can deactivate and delete the use of cookies in your browser settings at any time (see **Restricting \u002F Deactivating cookies** ).\n\n#### Google tools\n\nGoogle stores data on its own Google servers around the world. Most of them are located in the USA. At https:\u002F\u002Fwww.google.com\u002Fabout\u002Fdatacenters\u002Flocations\u002F?hl=de you can find out exactly where the Google servers are located. If you have consented to the use of Google tools (see analysis, tracking and advertising cookies) and we transmit data to Google in the USA, your personal data are protected by separate order processing agreements, which include standard contractual clauses approved by the EU commission to ensure the security of your data, between Google and PLAION (for more information see Section 5.).\n\nInformation of the third party provider: Google Ireland Limited, Google Building Gordon House, Barrow St, Dublin 4, Ireland.\n\n#### Google's retargeting tools\n\nOur websites use Google Inc.'s Google AdSense Resale Technology, 1600 Amphitheater Parkway Mountain View, CA 94043, USA (\"Google\"). This technology enables targeted ads to be shown to users who have already visited our online services and are interested in our services. Likewise users who are similar to the visitors of our websites can be addressed. Advertising is displayed using cookies. The information generated by the Cookie about the use of the website is transmitted to Google's servers in the USA and stored there. If the IP address is transmitted, it will be shortened by the last 3 digits. With Cookies, the user behavior on a website can be analyzed and then used to deliver targeted product recommendations and advertising based on the interests of the user.\n\nIf you prefer not to receive targeted advertising, you may disable Google's use of cookies for these purposes for all websites by visiting [https:\u002F\u002Fwww.google.com\u002Fsettings\u002Fads\u002F](https:\u002F\u002Fwww.google.com\u002Fsettings\u002Fads\u002F).\n\nYou can deactivate and delete the use of Cookies in your browser settings at any time (see **Restricting \u002F Deactivating cookies** ).\n\nPlease note that Google has its own privacy policy that is independent of ours. We assume no responsibility or liability for their policies and procedures. We encourage you to read Google's privacy policy ([https:\u002F\u002Fwww.google.com\u002Fintl\u002Fen\u002Fpolicies\u002Fprivacy\u002F](https:\u002F\u002Fwww.google.com\u002Fintl\u002Fen\u002Fpolicies\u002Fprivacy\u002F)).\n\n#### Google Tag Manager\n\nPLAION uses the Google Tag Manager. Google Tag Manager is a solution that allows marketers to manage web page tags from one interface. The Tag Manager tool itself (which implements the tags) is a cookie-less domain and does not collect personally identifiable information. The tool triggers other tags, which may collect data. Google Tag Manager does not access this data. If disabled at the domain or cookie level, it will remain in effect for all tracking tags implemented with Google Tag Manager.\n\nGoogle Tag Manager FAQ: [https:\u002F\u002Fwww.google.com\u002Fintl\u002Fde\u002Ftagmanager\u002Ffaq.html](https:\u002F\u002Fwww.google.com\u002Fintl\u002Fde\u002Ftagmanager\u002Ffaq.html)\n\nGoogle Tag Manager Terms of Use: [https:\u002F\u002Fwww.google.com\u002Fintl\u002Fde\u002Ftagmanager\u002Fuse-policy.html](https:\u002F\u002Fwww.google.com\u002Fintl\u002Fde\u002Ftagmanager\u002Fuse-policy.html)\n\n#### Google Analytics\n\nIf you have given your consent, this website uses Google Analytics, a web analysis service of Google LLC. The responsible service provider in the EU is Google Ireland Limited, Gordon House, Barrow Street, Dublin 4, Ireland (\"Google\").\n\n_Scope of processing_\n\nGoogle Analytics uses cookies that enable an analysis of your use of our website. The information collected by the cookies about your use of this website is usually transferred to a Google server in the USA and stored.\n\nWe use the function 'anonymizeIP' (so-called IP-Masking): Due to the activation of IP-anonymization on this website, your IP-address will be shortened by Google within member states of the European Union or in other signatory states of the Agreement on the European Economic Area. Only in exceptional cases the full IP address will be transferred to a Google server in the USA and shortened there. The IP address transmitted by your browser within the framework of Google Analytics is not merged with other data from Google.\n\nDuring your website visit the following data will be collected:\n\n- the pages you call up, your \"click behavior\"\n- Achievement of \"website goals\" (conversions, e.g. newsletter registrations, downloads, purchases)\n- Your user behavior (for example clicks, dwell time, bounce rates)\n- Your approximate location (region)\n- Your IP address (in abbreviated form)\n- technical information about your browser and the end devices you use (e.g. language settings, screen resolution)\n- your internet provider\n- the referrer URL (via which website\u002Fadvertising medium you came to this website)\n\n##### Purposes of processing\n\nOn behalf of the operator of this website, Google will use this information to evaluate your pseudonymous use of the website and to compile reports on website activity. The reports provided by Google Analytics serve to analyze the performance of our website and the success of our marketing campaigns.\n\n##### Recipient\n\nThe data recipient is\n\nGoogle Ireland Limited, Gordon House, Barrow Street, Dublin 4, Ireland\n\nas data processor. For this purpose we have concluded a contract with Google. Google LLC, headquartered in California, USA, and, if applicable, US authorities can access the data stored at Google.\n\n##### Transfer to third countries\n\nA transfer of data to the USA cannot be excluded.\n\nDuration of storage\n\nThe data sent by us and linked to cookies is automatically deleted after 14 months. Data is automatically deleted once a month as soon as the storage period is reached.\n\nYou can also prevent the collection of data generated by the cookie and related to your use of the website (including your IP address) to Google and the processing of this data by Google by\n\na. not giving your consent to the setting of the cookie or\n\nb. downloading and installing the browser add-on to disable Google Analytics HERE LINK TO OPT OUT INSERT.\n\nBy setting your browser software accordingly you can also prevent the storage of cookies. If your browser is set to refuse all cookies, the functionality of this and other websites may be limited.\n\nFor more information, see **Cookies**.\n\nMore information about the Terms of Service and Privacy can be found at\n\n[https:\u002F\u002Fwww.google.com\u002Fintl\u002Fen\\_uk\u002Fpolicies\u002F](https:\u002F\u002Fwww.google.com\u002Fintl\u002Fen_uk\u002Fpolicies\u002F).\n\n[https:\u002F\u002Fsupport.google.com\u002Fanalytics\u002Fanswer\u002F6004245?hl=de&ref\\_topic=2919631](https:\u002F\u002Fsupport.google.com\u002Fanalytics\u002Fanswer\u002F6004245?hl=de&ref_topic=2919631)\n\n[https:\u002F\u002Fpolicies.google.com\u002Fprivacy?hl=de&gl=de](https:\u002F\u002Fpolicies.google.com\u002Fprivacy?hl=de&gl=de)\n\n#### Facebook plugins\n\nPLAION uses social media plugins. For example, the \"Like\" button from Facebook. These plugins are operated by Facebook Inc., 1601 S. California Ave, Palo Alto, CA 94304, USA (\"Facebook\"). The plugins can be identified by one of the Facebook logos.\n\nWhen an user accesses one of our web pages containing one of these plugins, the internet browser connects directly to the Facebook servers. Facebook sends the contents of the plugins directly to the user's browser and back.\n\nIf you have activated scripts in your browser and have not installed a script blocker, your browser will forward your Personal Data to Facebook without any separate request. If logged-in, an immediate assignment of the data to the Facebook profile is possible. Since we have absolutely no control over the amount of data that Facebook collects with the help of these plugins, we would like to inform the user about our current level of knowledge:\n\nThe plugins that are integrated mean that Facebook will be notified when the user has accessed the corresponding page on our website. If the user is logged in to Facebook at the same time, Facebook can assign a visit to the user's personal Facebook account. When the user interacts with the plugins, for example by clicking on the \"Like\" button or posting a comment, the information is immediately transmitted by the browser directly to Facebook, where it is stored. If the user does not use Facebook, the service can still capture and store the IP address. For more information on how much data is collected and why and how it is then processed and used by Facebook, as well as information about user rights and the settings that are available to protect the privacy of users, you can access the Facebook Privacy Policy [https:\u002F\u002Fwww.facebook.com\u002Fabout\u002Fprivacy\u002F](https:\u002F\u002Fwww.facebook.com\u002Fabout\u002Fprivacy\u002F)\n\nIf you do not want Facebook to collect data from the PLAION website and link it to the information stored on Facebook, please log out of your Facebook account before visiting our websites and block the execution of Facebook script content in your browser.\n\nIf you are not logged in to Facebook or have not (yet) agreed to your data being collected and used, you should not click on Facebook plug-ins.\n\n#### Facebook Pixels\n\nPLAION also uses Facebook Pixels. The Facebook Pixel is part of the code implemented in our website. Its goal is to show conversions (it shows which devices were used by a user in an action) to create a so-called lookalike audience (i.e., to reach users with advertisements that have features similar to other customers and to generate comprehensive statistics on the use of our website.\n\nWhen you visit our website, the Facebook Pixel creates a direct link to the Facebook servers. In this case, the Facebook server will be informed that you have visited our website and Facebook will assign this information to your personal Facebook profile. This process is designed to evaluate the effectiveness of Facebook advertisements for statistical and market research purposes and may help to optimize future advertising efforts.\n\nWe only set these types of cookies with your prior consent ( **see Analysis, tracking and advertising cookies** )\n\nFor more information see **Cookies**.\n\nFurther information about the collection and use of your personal data via Facebook as well as your rights and options can be found here:\n\n[https:\u002F\u002Fwww.facebook.com\u002Fabout\u002Fprivacy\u002F](https:\u002F\u002Fwww.facebook.com\u002Fabout\u002Fprivacy\u002F)\n\n#### Facebook Insight\n\nWhen you visit our Facebook pages, Facebook save cookies on your device. The data collected includes the age group, gender, education, occupation, relationship status and other information that is publicly available on your Facebook profile. This serves Facebook and us to find out more about your interests and hobbies and to make you more suitable offers.\n\nPLAION, as the operator of the website, does not have access to the data, but only to the summarized page insights. This summary provides PLAION with important trends, without disclosing any details that could identify you (please note that PLAION may use your profile picture in Insights). Media may be able to associate your profile picture in Insights with your \"likes\" for the page, if you have \"liked\" our site and set your \"like\" preferences for pages to \"public\").\n\nFacebook Ireland and PLAION have entered into an agreement that specifies which of both companies fulfills which obligation under the GDPR.\n\nFacebook Ireland is responsible for providing you with information about the processing for Page Insights and to enable you to exercise your rights under the GDPR. Exercise your rights. According to the GDPR, you have the right of access, rectification, portability and deletion of the data, as well as to object to the processing of the data and to the restriction of the processing thereof. In your Facebook settings you can learn more about these rights. You may also contact Facebook Ireland's Privacy Officer, whose contact details can be found in the Facebook Ireland Data Policy. It is further agreed that the Irish Data Protection Commission is the lead supervisory authority that oversees processing for Page Insights. You always have the right to lodge a complaint with the Irish Data Protection Commission (see at www.dataprotection.ie) or with any other supervisory authority.\n\nWe point out that Facebook currently does not offer the operators of a fan page any possibility to control or to restrict the Facebook Insight cookie. If you do not agree, we ask you not to visit our fan page. You also can deactivate the use of Cookies in your browser settings at any time and delete already stored Cookies.\n\nFor more information see **Cookies**.\n\nService provider information:\n\nFacebook Ireland Ltd., 4 Grand Canal Square, Grand Canal Harbour, Dublin 2 Ireland\n\nPrivacy Policy Facebook Ireland:\n\n[https:\u002F\u002Fwww.facebook.com\u002Fabout\u002Fprivacy\u002Fupdate](https:\u002F\u002Fwww.facebook.com\u002Fabout\u002Fprivacy\u002Fupdate)\n\nUser information for Facebook Insight:\n\n[https:\u002F\u002Fwww.facebook.com\u002Flegal\u002Fterms\u002Finformation\\_about\\_page\\_insights\\_data](https:\u002F\u002Fwww.facebook.com\u002Flegal\u002Fterms\u002Finformation_about_page_insights_data)\n\n#### Twitter conversion tracking\n\nWe use Twitter Inc.'s conversion tracking service, 795 Folsom St., Suite 600, San Francisco, CA 94107, USA (\"Twitter\"). This tracking records when a user of our website clicks on a link posted by Twitter. In this way, we and Twitter can see if a login has taken place. The identity of the user remains anonymous. In addition, we use the Tailored Audiences Service from Twitter. This allows us to approach our website users with targeted ads. To do this, Twitter uses a code snippet (tag) that we have integrated into our website. During this process, no personal data will be collected. Tailored Audiences is also used to create meaningful target lists.\n\nThis is also our legitimate interest in processing your data.\n\nFor more information about the privacy policies of Twitter, see their privacy policy ([https:\u002F\u002Ftwitter.com\u002Fprivacy?lang=en](https:\u002F\u002Ftwitter.com\u002Fprivacy?lang=en)).\n\nYou can customize your privacy settings for custom ads at this link: [https:\u002F\u002Fsupport.twitter.com\u002Farticles\u002F20170405-your-privacy-controls-for-tailored-ads](https:\u002F\u002Fsupport.twitter.com\u002Farticles\u002F20170405-your-privacy-controls-for-tailored-ads)\n\nTwitter also supports \"Do not track\" (DNT). If you have activated this option in your browser, Twitter will not receive browser-related information (browser cookie ID) from web partners with which it can tailor ads for you.\n\n### Restrict \u002F Deactivate cookies\n\nCookies are stored on your computer and transmitted by it to our website. Therefore, as a user, you have full control over the use of cookies. You can deactivate the use of cookies in your browser settings at any time and delete already stored cookies. This can also be done automatically.\n\nMost browsers are automatically set to accept cookies. If you do not wish to have cookies stored on your computer or to be informed about their storage, you can prevent the installation of cookies by adapting your browser software accordingly. In your browser settings, activate the option \"Do not accept cookies\" or \"Do not track\" (different depending on your browser). The instructions of your browser manufacturer will give you more information on how this works. However, we would like to point out that by preventing Cookies you may not be able to use all the functions of the website to the fullest extent.\n\nSome of our websites also use flash cookies - also known as \"locally shared items\" - on our websites. Flash cookies are small files, much like browser cookies, and are used to customize the design of web pages and store those requests. Flash cookies only collect aggregated data. Like normal cookies, flash cookies are small files on your computer. You can prevent flash cookies by adjusting your settings in the Macromedia website privacy settings panel at www.macromedia.com.\n\nPlease note that this Privacy Policy covers only the use of cookies by PLAION, but not the use of cookies by other advertisers.\n\n## C.Registration\n\nYou can register for some of our Services by creating an account on the website or in games. Registration requires the provision of your name, username, e-mail address, age, and a self-selected password. The provision of any other information is voluntary. For the registration we use the so-called double opt-in procedure, i.e. you will receive an e-mail in which you must confirm that you are the owner of the specified e-mail address and wish to create the account.\n\nWe only store the data for as long as we need them to provide the respective Services. In general, the data you provide, as well as the time of your registration for the Services and your IP address will be stored by us until you delete your account or until you make changes to your data (e.g., change your e-mail address). Your password will only be stored in hashed form (i.e., neither we nor our Partners can access the actual password).\n\nWe collect and use the data to the extent necessary to create the account and to provide the Services. The registration requires you to accept ourTerms of Service and Use, which constitute a contract between you and us. Therefore, the data processing is based on Art. 6 para. 1 lit. b GDPR (performance of contract).\n\n## D.Advertising \u002F Newsletter\n\nWith your consent, we will be happy to send you our newsletter. To do this, you must register for our newsletter. More details on the content of the newsletter in question are explained in the declaration of consent or on the registration page.\n\nYou can sign up for our free newsletter on our websites. For the registration to our newsletter we use a double opt-in procedure for GDPR compliance provided that GDPR applies to the country from which you are registering. After your registration, we will send you a message to the specified e-mail address with a link that you can click to confirm that you wish to receive the newsletter. If you do not confirm your registration within 24 hours, your details will not be used to send the newsletter and will be deleted after one week. In addition to your e-mail address, we collect and save the time of the submission of your consent. Only then can we document that you have voluntarily registered.\n\nWe also point out that we evaluate your user behavior when sending the newsletter, i.e., we can see if you open the newsletter or click on links contained in the newsletter. For this evaluation, our newsletter includes a so-called \"web beacon\". This is a pixel-sized file that we use to analyze the reach and success of our newsletter and tailor it to your needs. For the evaluations, we link the aforementioned data and the web beacons with your e-mail address and an individual ID. Links contained in the newsletter also contain this ID. The IDs are linked with further personal data from you including your name, Account and user profile, country, and technical data such as browser and operating system. By evaluating this data, we can assess the general use of the newsletter and gain insights into which content and parts should be further improved and developed according to user habits. This helps us to further personalize the newsletter to your interests and preferences.\n\nYour data will only be used to send, evaluate, and personalize newsletters. We store your data only as long as the subscription to the newsletter is active.\n\nIf you're receiving our newsletter in the European Union or the European Economic Area, Switzerland, or the UK, the legal basis for the related data processing is Art. 6 para. 1 lit. a GDPR or the corresponding provision in the Swiss and UK legislation, as the newsletter is only sent and evaluated with your consent. You can revoke your consent and cancel the subscription at any time with effect for the future. You will find a unsubscribe link in each newsletter.\n\n## E.E-mail contact \u002F Contact form \u002F Customer service\n\nYou can contact us by e-mail or through our contact form at any time and contact our support team. In this case, the Personal Data transmitted by e-mail or with your inquiry will be stored. The data is used exclusively for communication.\n\nThe basis for the processing is our legitimate interest to respond to your request as requested and is based on Art. 6 para. 1 lit. f GDPR.\n\nThe data will be deleted as soon as it is no longer necessary for the purpose of its collection.\n\nYou can object to the storage of your data at any time. However, a proper response to your inquiry can then no longer be guaranteed in individual cases.\n\n## F.Public information (online multiplayer games, community forum, blogs, Facebook, Twitter, etc.)\n\nFor all public information, including user-generated content, the following applies:\n\nYou can decide whether to post information about yourself on PLAION websites or in games, in public online chat rooms, blogs, forums, message boards, or similar communications channels or other social media platforms. Everyone can have access, view or use this public information. Information that you provide in this form is public information and you must not expect privacy or confidentiality.\n\nYou should be aware that Personal Data you provide in the course of these public activities can be read, collected or used by other users of these forums, and may also be used to provide you with unsolicited messages. Please also note that these contributions may be deleted or withdrawn by PLAION in accordance with the terms of use of these pages. We are not responsible for Personal Data shared on platforms not operated by PLAION. Therefore, before publishing, make sure that your posts do not contain information that is inappropriate for the public. You should be aware that your posts can be retrieved from search engines and are accessible worldwide, without being specific to our portal. Deleting or correcting such entries is often not possible with foreign operators.\n\nPlease make sure your privacy settings and behavior reflect your attitude.\n\nYou can delete posts in PLAION forums or message boards yourself at any time.\n\nYou may object to your data being processed by PLAION at any time or revoke your consent. For more information, see **Your legal rights.**\n\n## G.Sales of products\n\nFor the distribution or sale of PLAION or its Partner's products we process Personal Data which we have collected directly from you or which has been collected by our Partner and subsequently transmitted to us. This information is necessary to process the payment and deliver the products.\n\nPayment data will be transmitted to our payment service providers for processing payments. For delivery, your data (name, address) must be transmitted to the delivery company. Other Personal Data such as telephone number or e-mail address, which can ensure a smooth delivery process, we transmit only after your express consent. You can revoke your consent at any time.\n\nInventory, usage and statement data are, if necessary, also processed beyond the fulfillment of a contract. PLAION reserves the right to save IP addresses and log files for a limited period of time after using the website. This is to monitor and control that you comply with our terms and conditions, in particular to ensure proper execution of the payment you have authorized. This process serves, in particular, to prevent or clarify cases of abuse and, in certain cases, to transmit this data to the competent authorities. To enforce regulatory compliance, IP addresses and console IDs, if available, can be used to personally identify you. Incidentally, any other evaluation of the data takes place anonymously. If no law enforcement action is taken and no no preliminary proceedings for abuse has been initiated, the IP addresses, log files and related Internet information will be stored for a maximum of six months under our statutory data retention obligation.\n\n## H.Mobile tracking technologies\n\nIn our mobile apps we use so-called mobile tracking technologies. We use these services to collect data about the use of our apps so we can constantly improve our offerings. When using our apps, the data you submit will be collected and analyzed.\n\nIn this regard, the following data is compiled: IP address that is immediately anonymized, MAC address, anonymized device ID (identifier for advertisers - IDFA or Google Advertiser ID - GAID), browser type, language settings, ISP, network status, time zone , URL of entry and exit pages, date of access and time, clickstream data and other statistical information about the use of our services.\n\nA direct individual identification based on this data is not possible. The data collected in this way is used to create anonymous user profiles. The data collected by the tracking technologies will not be used to personally identify a visitor to our web pages without his express consent. The capture and storage of the data can be disabled at any time with future effect by adjusting your mobile device's settings as follows:\n\nIf it's an Apple mobile device (IFDA): Open your mobile device settings (such as iPhone or iPad) and select the \"Privacy\" menu item. Under \"Advertising,\" you can turn off ad tracking.\n\nFor Android devices: Open the settings in your app list and tap the \"Show\" button. If the ad window is open, you can disable the Google Advertising ID.\n\nYou can also reset your IFDA or Google Ad ID or assign a new one in the settings.\n\n**3. Lawful grounds for the processing of your Personal Data**\n\nInsofar as we obtain the consent for processing of Personal Data, Art. 6 para. 1 lit. a GDPR serves as lawful ground.\n\nIf the processing of Personal Data is necessary for the performance of a contract to which you are a party to, Art. 6 para. 1 lit. b GDPR serves as lawful ground. This also applies to processing activities prior to entering into a contract.\n\nInsofar as processing of Personal Data is required to fulfill a legal obligation we are subject to, Art. 6 para. 1 lit. c GDPR serves as lawful ground.\n\nInsofar as processing of personal data is necessary for the performance of a task carried out in a vital interest of the data subject or another natural person, or in the public interest, Art. 6 para. 1 lit. d and lit. e GDPR serve as lawful ground for processing.\n\nIf processing is necessary to pursue our legitimate interests, and if your interests, fundamental rights and freedoms do not prevail over our interest, Art. 6 para. 1 lit. f GDPR serves as lawful ground for processing. Our legitimate interests include, _inter alia_, the assertion, exercise or defense of civil claims or the operation of our websites.\n\n# I.How long will your Personal Data be stored\n\nWe will process and store Personal Data no longer than necessary for the purposes for which they have been collected. Subsequently, the Personal Data will be deleted in accordance with the statutory provisions.\n\nIn general, your Personal Data will be stored during the term of our contractual relationships. However, in some cases, Personal Data may be stored for longer due to EU regulations, laws or other regulations to which we are subject or for as long as the retention of Personal Data is required due to other legal reasons (e.g. in accordance with Art. 17 para. 3 GDPR). This may include keeping your Personal Data after you have deactivated your account for the necessary period for us to pursue legitimate business interests, comply with (and demonstrate compliance with) legal obligations, resolve disputes or enforce our agreements. If there are legitimate reasons opposing a deletion, for instance statutory retention or storage periods, processing of these data will be limited. In such case the data will be erased as soon as the reason for further storage ceases to exist, for example if the statutory retention period expires.\n\nIs the right to process Personal Data based on your consent in accordance with Art. 6 para. 1 lit. a GDPR the data will be deleted as soon as the purpose of the storage is canceled or if you revoke your consent. A revocation is possible at any time. The revocation of your consent does not affect the lawfulness of the processing carried out on the basis of the consent until the revocation.\n\nPlease contact our **Data Protection Officer** for any inquiries. For more information please see **Your legal rights**.\n\n# J.How do we disclose Personal Data?\n\n### Transfer to our service providers\n\nWe share your Personal Data with a limited number of third-party service providers who process it on our behalf to provide our Platform Services, and who have agreed to privacy restrictions similar to our Privacy Policy. These service providers may help us to host our websites or provide (technical) support, among others. We have entered into data processing agreements with our service providers. Therefore, those transfer of data are covered by Art. 28 GDPR.\n\n### Transfer to affiliated companies and other third parties\n\nInsofar as it is necessary for internal administrative purposes or our business operations or in case we have obtained your consent, we may share your Personal Data globally with companies of the PLAIONGroup (to affiliates, subsidiaries and the parent company). When transferring and using the data, we always comply with data protection regulations and the scope of your consent. The affiliated companies may - insofar as they are entitled to do so or you have consented - also use the data for their own purposes, e.g. direct advertising for their own services.\n\nDue to the corporate structure, PLAIONhas a legitimate interest in the transfer of Personal Data within the group to the extent necessary for administrative or operational services pursuant to Art. 6 para. 1 lit. f GDPR.\n\nAny other transfer to third parties will only take place if this is necessary for the fulfillment of the purpose of the contract, we can invoke our legitimate interest or you have given us your consent.\n\n### Transfer for legal or law enforcement reasons\n\nPLAIONmay also disclose Personal Data to law enforcement or the relevant civil authorities to enforce legal rights and to comply with the law, or to comply with a decision by a government or other competent authority, or if we have reason to believe that disclosure is required to respond to potential or actual violations or interference with our rights, property, reputation, business operations, users or others who may be harmed, or if we believe disclosures are required to protect our rights or us against fraud, or to comply with any PLAIONlawsuit, court order or legal process served.\n\n### Corporate transactions\n\nIn the context of corporate transactions (acquisition, sale, restructuring of companies or company shares), third parties may gain access to your Personal Data. Disclosure for this purpose serves our legitimate interest pursuant to Art. 6 para. 1 lit. f GDPR.\n\n# K.Do we transfer Personal Data internationally?\n\nWe are a global business. Personal Data may be stored and processed in any country where we have operations or where we engage service providers. We may transfer Personal Data that we maintain about you to our Partners, service providers and other recipients in countries other than the country in which the Personal Data was originally collected, including the United States. Those countries may have data protection rules that are different from those of your country.\n\nHowever, we will take measures to ensure that any such transfers comply with applicable data protection laws and that your Personal Data remains protected according to the standards described in this Privacy Policy. In certain circumstances, courts, law enforcement agencies, regulatory agencies, or security authorities in those other countries may be entitled to access your Personal Data.\n\nIf you are located in the European Economic Area or Switzerland, we comply with applicable laws to provide an adequate level of data protection for the transfer of your Personal Data to the USA and to other countries outside of the European Economic Area (\"Third Countries\"). Please note that some Third Countries, including the USA, do not guarantee an adequate level of data protection. Transferring data to these Third Countries may therefore involve additional risks for your privacy rights. For example, the enforcement of your rights can be more difficult in these Third Countries.\n\nHowever, we use our best efforts to ensure that an international data transfer to Third Countries is governed by an adequate data transfer mechanism based on a risk assessment regarding the transfer. We rely on one or more of the following mechanisms: EU Standard Contractual Clauses with a data recipient outside the European Economic Area, and\u002For verification that the European Commission has adopted an adequacy decision in accordance with Art. 45 GDPR for the respective Third Country.\n\n### Third party products and\u002For services\n\nYou may register for Services from our websites. Certain Services are provided to you in partnership with third party(s) and may require you to disclose Personal Data in order to register for and access the Services. Such Services shall identify the third party partners during the registration. If you choose to register for such Services your Personal Data will be transferred to such third parties and will be subject to the privacy policy and practices of such third parties. We are not responsible for the privacy practices and policies of such third parties and, therefore, you should review the privacy practices and policies of such third parties prior to providing your personally identifiable information in connection with such products and\u002For services.\n\nFor further information about the EU Standards Contractual Clauses, please contact our Data Protection Officer by email to dpo@plaion.com.\n\n# L.Minors\n\nProtecting the privacy of children is particularly important to us. PLAION understands that parents, guardians or other adults often use our family services, including for use by minors. If a minor under the age of 16 (or below the minimum age in the Member State concerned, which can be lower) submits Personal Data to PLAION and we learn that such Personal Data contains information of a child below 16 (or below the minimum age in the area, which could be lower) and there is no effective consent, we will delete the data as soon as possible. It is our policy to comply with any applicable law protecting minors.\n\nThe consent of children under the age of 16 is only lawful if the parents have given their consent. Each member state of the EU can reduce the age to a maximum of 13.\n\nPLAION, taking into account the available technology, makes efforts to make sure that the parents have given their consent to children. Nevertheless, we would like to make parents aware that age verifications can be technically bypassed. Please do not leave your children unattended on the Internet and explain their importance to the proper handling of their data.\n\n# M.Security of data\n\nWe commit ourselves to data security within the framework of the applicable data protection laws and current IT security standards. Your Personal Data is protected against unauthorized access and loss through the use of various electronic, technical, physical, administrative and contractual measures. PLAION has taken the necessary technical and organizational precautions to ensure that to both internally and by external service providers fully comply with our Privacy Policy.\n\nWe adhere to generally accepted industry standards to protect personal and non-personal data for both transmission and storage.\n\nAll PLAION employees are required to comply with data security and privacy policies, and have appropriate instructions and are trained on a regular basis.\n\nFor payment transactions, your data is encrypted using the SSL process. Our employees and or payment providers are not authorized to request further user data such as bank details or passwords.\n\nPersons requiring access for technical, business, or editorial maintenance of the server and portal are legally bound by a confidentiality and non-disclosure agreement\n\nPlease note, however, that no electronic communication or electronic storage method is completely secure. We remind you that despite our high standards, information that you voluntarily provide in the internet is never guaranteed to be 100% secure. There is always the danger that third parties will gain unauthorized access. While we strive to use all commercially reasonable means to protect your personal information, we cannot guarantee absolute security.\n\n# N.Non-liability for third parties\n\nWe remind you that in various technical areas we work with external partners who also offer websites and services accessible from our sites. The fact that we link to a website is not an endorsement, authorization or representation of our affiliation with that third party. If you click on a link to a third party site, including on an advertisement, you will leave the PLAION site and go to the site you selected. As we cannot control the activities of third parties, we cannot accept responsibility for any use of your personal information by such third parties, and we cannot guarantee that they will adhere to the same privacy and security practices as PLAION. These third party websites and services should have their own privacy policies. We assume no responsibility or liability for such declarations or activities that take place at other sites. We encourage you to review the privacy policies of any other service provider from whom you request services. If you visit a third party website you should consult that site's privacy policy before providing any personal information.\n\n# O.Your legal rights\n\n1.\n## European Economic Area \u002F GDPR\n\nYou can **revoke** a given consent at any time. To ensure the security and integrity of your Personal Data, we may ask you for additional information in justified cases to verify that you are the owner of that data. The revocation of consent does not affect the legality of the processing carried out on the basis of the consent until the revocation.\n\nYou can also request information from us at any time as to which Personal Data we process from you ( **Right of Access** , Art. 15 GDPR). Insofar as the data concerning you is incorrect or incomplete, you have a **Right of Rectification** (Art. 16 GDPR). In certain cases, you have the right to request a **restriction of processing**. Details can be found in Art. 18 para. 1 GDPR.\n\nYou can demand that the Personal Data concerning you shall be deleted immediately ( **Right to Erasure** , Art. 17 GDPR). In particular, we are required to immediately erase this information if the data is no longer necessary for the purposes for which it was collected or if you revoke your consent. Further deletion obligations can be found in Art. 17 para. 1 GDPR.\n\nPlease note, however, that statutory provisions provide for a retention period and we are allowed to store data for the settlement of disputes, for the enforcement of our Terms of Use and due to technical and legal reasons (e.g. backup files). This data may only be deleted after periods of time specified by law.\n\nIf you have the right to rectify, delete or restrict the processing by us, we are obliged to notify all recipients to whom your personal data have been disclosed of this correction or deletion of the data or restriction of processing, unless this proves to be impossible or involves a disproportionate effort ( **Notification Obligation** , Art. 19 GDPR). You also have the right at any time, for reasons arising from your particular situation, to **prevent and object** the processing of your Personal Data, pursuant to Art. 6 para. 1 lit. e or f GDPR.\n\nYou also have the right to receive personally identifiable information you provide to us in a structured, common and machine-readable format. You also have the right to transfer this data to another person without hindrance ( **Right to Data Portability, Art. 20 GDPR** ).\n\nPlease note that in we may reasonably ask you for additional information to verify that you are the owner of this data. This is for the security and integrity of your data.\n\nWithout prejudice to any other administrative or judicial remedy, you have the right to file a complaint to a supervisory authority, in particular in the Member State of residence, place of work or place of alleged infringement, if you believe that the processing of the personal data concerning you is violates the GDPR.\n\nPlease direct your data protection request to the **Data Protection Officer** of PLAION.\n\n## B.California residents' rights \u002F CCPA\n\nWe are regulated under the California Consumer Privacy Act (\" **CCPA**\"), which applies to California residents.\n\nUnder the CCPA, California residents have several important rights:\n\n- Right to Know: You can ask us what Personal Data we hold about you and request a copy. This includes:\n\n- The type and specific pieces of personal data we have collected;\n- The types of sources we collect the data from;\n- The purpose for collecting your Personal Data;\n- The third parties we share that data with.\n\n- Right to Delete: You can request that we erase your Personal Data. There are some exceptions to this right, if we:\n\n- Need to complete the transaction for which the Personal Data was collected or if there is an ongoing business relationship or contract with you;\n- Detect security incidents and protect against malicious, deceptive, fraudulent, or illegal activity;\n- Need to identify and repair errors affecting Service functionality;\n- Exercise free speech or ensure another consumer can exercise (or another lawful right);\n- Need to comply with the California Electronic Communications Privacy Act\n- Engage in research in the public interest;\n- Enable solely internal uses that are in line with your expectations for using your Personal Data;\n- Need to comply with a legal obligation;\n- Otherwise use your Personal Data internally, in a way that's compatible with the reason we collected it in the first place.\n\n- Sale of your Personal Data: We don't sell any of your Personal Data for any purposes.\n- Other Rights: California residents also have the right to request information about our disclosure of Personal Data to third parties for direct marketing purposes during the calendar year before your request. This request is free and may be made only once a year.\n\nWe won't discriminate against you for exercising any of the rights listed above.\n\nIf you would like to exercise any of those rights, please contact our Data Protection Officer and email us at dpo@plaion.com. To ensure the security and integrity of your data, we may ask you for additional information in justified cases to verify that you are the owner of that data.\n\n## C.Brazilian residents' rights \u002F LGPD\n\nWe are regulated under the Lei Geral de Proteção de Dados (\" **LGPD**\"), which applies to Brazilian residents.\n\nUnder the LGPD, Brazilian residents have several important rights:\n\n- Know when we use your Personal Data\n- Access your personal data, correct any errors, or delete your Personal Data\n- Anonymize, block, or delete data that we don't need or are not processing in compliance with the LGPD\n- Request we transfer your Personal Data to another provider\n- Be informed about who we share your Personal Data with\n- Be informed about your ability to deny consent and any consequences\n- To revoke your consent\n\nThese rights apply to any personal data collected or processed in Brazil, as well as any Personal Data processed for the purpose of providing goods or services in Brazil.\n\nIf you would like to exercise any of those rights, contact our Data Protection Officer an email us at dpo@plaion.com. To ensure the security and integrity of your Personal Data, we may ask you for additional information in justified cases to verify that you are the owner of that data.\n\n# D.Modification of the Privacy Policy\n\nPLAION reserves the right to modify and update this Privacy Policy at any time in accordance with applicable privacy laws. If we change our Privacy Policy, we will post those changes to this Privacy Policy, the website or other places so that you are aware of what information we collect, how we use it, and under what circumstances, if any, we disclose it. If we make material or significant changes to this Privacy Policy, we will notify you by email or by a notice on the applicable websites or during log in. Please visit this page frequently.\n\n# E.Questions and comments\n\nIf you have any questions, concerns or remarks about data privacy, please contact our Data Protection Officer by email to ",description:"Road 96: Mile 0 ist ein narratives Abenteuerspiel mit musikalischer Komponente, das von DigixArt entwickelt wurde, dem französischen Studio hinter den erfolgreichen Spielen Road 96 und 11-11: Memories Retold, das fünffach mit dem Game-Award \"Pégases\" ausgezeichnet wurde. In dem von Ravenscourt herausgegebenen Abenteuer schlüpfen die Spieler abwechselnd in die Rollen von Zoe und Kaito, zwei Teenagern mit unterschiedlichen Lebensumständen und Überzeugungen. Sie erkunden White Sands, eine luxuriöse Wohnanlage, in der die Elite Petrias lebt und wo Kaitos Eltern arbeiten.\n\nZoe ist einer der Charaktere aus Road 96. Sie kommt aus dem reichen Viertel der Stadt und ihr Vater arbeitet für die Regierung. Kaito, ein Charakter aus Lost in Harmony, lebt in ärmeren Verhältnissen. Vivono e si avventurano a White Sands, una lussuosa città in cui risiede l'élite di Petria e in cui lavorano i genitori di Kaito.\n\nZoe è uno dei personaggi di Road 96. La loro amicizia è solida, ma presto tutto potrebbe cambiare.\n\nIl loro viaggio in Road 96: Mile 0 metterà a dura prova il loro rapporto e tutto ciò in cui credono. Ma fai attenzione, le pattuglie nemiche continuano a perlustrare le strade: devi usare l'astuzia per rimanere nell'ombra... e in vita. Sblocca percorsi verso altri quartieri, arruola nuove reclute civili e fai ritorno prima dell'alba per non farti catturare.\n- CON LE SPALLE AL MURO\nI rinforzi sono in arrivo, ma ci metteranno settimane. Dovrai affrontare fame, ferite, malattie e disperazione, ma anche le tensioni crescenti tra i civili e i difensori. Sosterrai le truppe o terrai in vita i tuoi cittadini? Vous n'avez peut-être pas à lutter frontalement contre les envahisseurs, mais le sort de la cité est entre vos mains. \n\nSoutenez les derniers soldats résistant aux forces ennemies écrasantes et tenez jusqu'à l'arrivée des renforts. Vous devrez approvisionner l'ultime bastion de défenseurs et le soutenir par tous les moyens possibles à la veille des batailles qui se déroulent régulièrement, ou les ennemis finiront par prendre le donjon. À vous également de protéger vos civils et votre campement des pluies de flèches enflammées et de rochers s'abattant sur vous.\n- GÉREZ LES RESSOURCES ET FABRIQUEZ DES VIVRES\\\nVous aurez besoin de meilleures armes, d'un toit sur votre tête, de nourriture chaude et de tout ce que cela implique. Et le seul moyen d'obtenir tout ça est de le fabriquer vous-même, avec votre équipe. Mais les ressources sont limitées et vous allez devoir subvenir aux besoins à la fois des soldats et des civils. Trouvez donc des moyens de conserver la nourriture, de développer votre infrastructure et d'utiliser vos vivres plus efficacement.\n- FOUILLEZ LA CITÉ EN RUINES\\\nEn vous aventurant hors de la relative sécurité du donjon, vous devrez explorer la cité mise à sac pendant la nuit afin de collecter de précieuses ressources et d'aider les citoyens survivants – ou d'en tirer profit. Mais prudence : les patrouilles ennemies parcourent les rues et vous devrez faire preuve de ruse pour rester invisible... et en vie. Débloquez des passages vers d'autres quartiers, recrutez de nouveaux civils et retournez à l'abri avant l'aube.\n- LE DOS AU MUR\\\nL'aide arrive, mais pas avant des semaines. Et dans un siège tel que celui-ci, un dilemme peut rapidement en entraîner un autre, et vous allez très rapidement faire face à des choix moraux. Le destin de vos compagnons – ainsi que de la cité – est entièrement entre vos mains. Il y aura la faim, les blessures, la maladie et le désespoir, mais également des tensions entre les civils et les défenseurs. Approvisionner les troupes ou garder les civils en vie ? C'est à vous de décider.\n- RACONTEZ VOTRE PROPRE HISTOIRE\\\nSiege Survival: Gloria Victis est développé à l'aide d'une plateforme de création de parties qui encouragera les modifications et le contenu créé par la communauté au lancement. MAUERN DÜRFEN NICHT FALLEN",description:"Siege Survival: Gloria Victis spielt in der mittelalterlichen Welt von Gloria Victis und versetzt dich mitten in die Belagerung deiner Stadt durch einen grausamen Feind.\n\nEine kleine Gruppe Bürger sitzt in der letzten noch stehenden Bastion fest und ist die letzte Hoffnung für die verzweifelten Verteidiger. Zwar stellst du dich dem Feind nicht selbst entgegen, doch das Schicksal der Stadt liegt in deinen Händen. \n\nUnterstütze die letzten Soldaten, die sich der Übermacht des Feindes entgegenstellen, und überlebe, bis die rettende Verstärkung eintrifft. Baue dein Lager aus, verwalte Rohstoffe, stelle während des Tages Vorräte her und gehe nachts in der gefallenen Stadt auf Streifzug, um Rohstoffe und neue Rekruten zu finden.",accent_color:Mu,background_color:Mv,key_media_header:Mw,locale:bb,rating:a,show_quarterly:t,release_date:Mx,game_features:"- ÜBERLEBE DIE BELAGERUNG\\\nEinige wenige erschöpfte Soldaten, die dringend Pfeile, Waffen, Rüstungen und medizinische Versorgung benötigen, bilden die letzte Verteidigungslinie der Stadt. Du musst dafür sorgen, dass diese letzte Bastion der Verteidiger mit Vorräten versorgt und auf jede erdenkliche Weise unterstützt wird, denn alle paar Tage greift der Feind erneut an und versucht, die Festung zu erstürmen. Außerdem musst du deine Bürger und dein Lager beschützen, wenn brennende Pfeile und gewaltige Felsbrocken vom Himmel herabstürzen.\n- VERWALTE ROHSTOFFE UND STELLE VORRÄTE HER\\\nEs liegt an dir, bessere Waffen, warmes Essen, ein Dach über dem Kopf, und alles weitere überlebensnotwendige bereitzustellen – all das musst du zusammen mit deinen Leuten selbst herstellen. Rohstoffe sind jedoch begrenzt und du musst sowohl die Soldaten als auch die Bürger versorgen. Deine Aufgabe lautet also, Nahrung einzuteilen, die Infrastruktur auszubauen und Vorräte effizienter einzusetzen.\n- GEHE IN DER GEFALLENEN STADT AUF STREIFZUG\\\nVerlasse die relative Sicherheit der Burg, um in der Nacht die geplünderte Stadt zu durchstreifen, überlebenswichtige Rohstoffe zu sammeln und den letzten dort verbliebenen Bürgern zu helfen – oder sie auszunutzen. Doch Vorsicht: Feindliche Soldaten patrouillieren die Straßen. Du musst clever vorgehen, um nicht gesehen zu werden ... und am Leben zu bleiben. Schalte Routen zu anderen Distrikten frei, rekrutiere weitere Bürger und erreiche die schützende Burg, bevor der Morgen graut, um nicht erwischt zu werden.\n- MIT DEM RÜCKEN ZUR WAND\\\nHilfe ist unterwegs, aber es dauert noch Wochen, bis sie eintrifft. In solch einer Belagerung kann ein Dilemma schnell zum nächsten führen und schon bald wirst du schwere moralische Entscheidungen treffen müssen. Das Schicksal deiner Mitstreiter – und das der Stadt – liegt allein in deinen Händen. Du wirst es mit Hunger, Verletzungen, Krankheit und Verzweiflung zu tun bekommen, aber auch die Spannungen zwischen den Bürgern und den Verteidigern werden stetig zunehmen. Versorgst du die Truppen mit Nahrung oder sicherst du das Überleben der Bürger? Diese Entscheidungen kannst nur du treffen.\n- ERLEBE DEINE GANZ EIGENE GESCHICHTE\\\nSiege Survival: Gloria Victis wurde auf Grundlage einer Spieleditor-Plattform entwickelt, mit der sich Mods und von der Community entwickelte Inhalte ins Spiel implementieren lassen. Stampfe deine eigenen Szenarien und Geschichten aus dem Boden und erweitere das Universum von Gloria Con batallas cada pocos días, los enemigos no tardarán en asaltar el castillo. Deberás enviar provisiones y suministros al bastión y ayudar a los defensores en todo lo que sea posible. Además, tendrás que proteger a los civiles y a tu campamento de las oleadas de flechas de fuego y rocas gigantes.\n- GESTIONA TUS RECURSOS Y CREA SUMINISTROS\nHarán falta armas mejores, un techo bajo el que resguardarse, comida caliente y demás necesidades vitales, y la única forma de conseguir todo esto es si tus compañeros y tú lo creáis. Sin embargo, los recursos son limitados y tanto las tropas como los civiles los necesitan. Tendrás que descubrir cómo conservar comida, desarrollar las infraestructuras y usar los suministros de forma eficaz.\n- SAQUEA LA CIUDAD CONQUISTADA\nAbandona la seguridad del bastión por la noche para explorar la ciudad saqueada, buscar valiosos recursos y ayudar a los supervivientes... o aprovecharte de ellos. Ten cuidado, el enemigo patrulla las calles. La astucia será lo más importante para moverte por las sombras y sobrevivir hasta el amanecer. Desbloquea caminos a nuevos distritos, recluta a nuevos civiles y vuelve antes de que la luz del día te delate.\n- ENTRE LA ESPADA Y LA PARED\nLos refuerzos están en camino, pero tardarán semanas en llegar. En un asedio como este, cualquier dilema puede crear una reacción en cadena y pronto tendrás que tomar difíciles decisiones morales. El destino de tus compañeros y de la ciudad está en tus manos. No tendrás que lidiar solo con el hambre, las heridas, las enfermedades o la angustia, sino también con las tensiones entre los civiles y el ejército. ¿Abasteces a las tropas o ayudas a tus compañeros? Welpen der C3-Klasse (Cute Cybernetic Corgi). \n\nSchieße, weiche aus und belle dir deinen Weg durch dieses bezaubernde Bark ‘em Up! Zahllose Gegnerwellen, gewaltige Bosse und tödliche Hindernisse stellen dein Können auf die Probe. Hilf Bullet auf seiner Reise, seine Freundin und Besitzerin Nixie vor schrecklichen Aliens zu retten! \n\nKeine Sorge, mit einem einstellbaren Schwierigkeitsgrad von „Welpe“ bis „Ultra-Albtraum“ ist das Abenteuer für jeden geeignet. Als echter Cyber-Welpe der C3-Klasse bietet Bullet mehr als nur die herkömmliche Bewaffnung. Lösche deine Feinde mit 3 verschiedenen Großangriffen aus oder mach sie mit deinem Kampfgeist fertig! \n- Rivalität\\\nMeistere die Macht des Bellens und stelle dein Können auf der Bestenliste unter Beweis! Auf das dein Name auf ewig ungeschlagen dort eingraviert steht. Zeig deinen Freunden, welcher Corgi das Alphatier ist! \n- Erstelle & Teile\\\nLass deiner Kreativität freien Lauf! ダイスは王国の臣民を表しています。臣民に食料やビール、薬草などを与えて、彼らの幸福度と健康度を維持しましょう。うまく維持できないと、臣民が飢えたり、病気になったり、戦闘で負傷したり、冬の吹雪の容赦ない寒さによって凍死したりしてしまいます。\n- プレイスタイルに合わせて、自動生成されるリングワールドの世界を探検しましょう。未開地の開拓や資源の収集、建物の建築を行ない、統治を確立。臣下を雇い、技術を研究しながら、冬を乗り切る戦略を立ててください。\n- 最初はつつましい農民である住民も、ダイスロールを通じて見事な戦略を立てることで、市民、兵士、神官、商人へと成長していきます。また、「評議会」と協力して新しい政策を打ち出し、さまざまな階級に属するダイスの幸福度を維持することも重要です。もしかすると、ゲームの流れを変えることもできるかもしれません。\n- ダイスを鋳造することで強力な「組立ダイス」を生成。ダイスの面を強化すれば、個性的なダイスアビリティがアンロックされます。究極のダイスを生み出して、次の勝利へ繋げましょう。\n- ダイスを振る。ゲームオーバー。その繰り返しの中で、 6人の統治者をすべてアンロックして、自分のプレイスタイルに最も合った統治者を見つけてみてください。ゲーム開始時の状況はさまざま。その中で、博打のようなアビリティをうまく使うコツを見つけましょう。『Dice Legacy』は、プレイするたびに展開が異なるため、リングワールドの霧に隠された秘密を見つけ出すチャンスは毎回発生します。\n- 謎めいた文明を発見し、リングワールドの秘密を解き明かしましょう。集落を「異なる民」と呼ばれる者たちから守るのです。彼らが何者で、どうやってこの未開の地にたどり着いたのか。そして町の先にうごめく霧には何が潜んでいるのかを暴き出しましょう。\"\n",testdate:a,show_yearly:t,hero_cutout:a,store_links:[{id:cQ,system:a,url:XY,store:a},{id:gS,system:a,url:XZ,store:a},{id:ai,system:a,url:afc,store:a}],info:{id:gW,developer:X_,players:M,offical_url:a},key_media:[{__component:u,id:Fe,embed_code:aJu}],media:[{__component:l,id:590,image:{id:tu,name:X$,alternativeText:d,caption:d,width:r,height:q,formats:{thumbnail:{name:Ya,hash:Yb,ext:c,mime:b,width:k,height:m,size:Yc,path:a,url:Yd},large:{name:Ye,hash:Yf,ext:c,mime:b,width:j,height:p,size:Yg,path:a,url:Yh},medium:{name:Yi,hash:Yj,ext:c,mime:b,width:i,height:o,size:Yk,path:a,url:Yl},small:{name:Ym,hash:Yn,ext:c,mime:b,width:f,height:n,size:Yo,path:a,url:Yp}},hash:Yq,ext:c,mime:b,size:Yr,url:Ys,previewUrl:a,provider:e,provider_metadata:a,created_at:N,updated_at:N}},{__component:l,id:591,image:{id:By,name:Yt,alternativeText:d,caption:d,width:r,height:q,formats:{thumbnail:{name:Yu,hash:Yv,ext:c,mime:b,width:k,height:m,size:cU,path:a,url:Yw},large:{name:Yx,hash:Yy,ext:c,mime:b,width:j,height:p,size:Yz,path:a,url:YA},medium:{name:YB,hash:YC,ext:c,mime:b,width:i,height:o,size:YD,path:a,url:YE},small:{name:YF,hash:YG,ext:c,mime:b,width:f,height:n,size:YH,path:a,url:YI}},hash:YJ,ext:c,mime:b,size:YK,url:YL,previewUrl:a,provider:e,provider_metadata:a,created_at:N,updated_at:N}},{__component:l,id:592,image:{id:tp,name:YM,alternativeText:d,caption:d,width:r,height:q,formats:{thumbnail:{name:YN,hash:YO,ext:c,mime:b,width:k,height:m,size:YP,path:a,url:YQ},large:{name:YR,hash:YS,ext:c,mime:b,width:j,height:p,size:YT,path:a,url:YU},medium:{name:YV,hash:YW,ext:c,mime:b,width:i,height:o,size:YX,path:a,url:YY},small:{name:YZ,hash:Y_,ext:c,mime:b,width:f,height:n,size:Y$,path:a,url:Za}},hash:Zb,ext:c,mime:b,size:Zc,url:Zd,previewUrl:a,provider:e,provider_metadata:a,created_at:N,updated_at:N}},{__component:l,id:593,image:{id:Dc,name:Ze,alternativeText:d,caption:d,widt Victis」シリーズの中世世界を背景に持つサバイバルストラテジー。侵略された国で、過酷な包囲戦を強いられている都市が舞台となる。\n\n唯一残った要塞に閉じ込められた少数の民間人。必死で生命を護ろうとする防御部隊にとっては、彼らが最後の希望のよりどころだ。侵略軍と直接交戦はしないとしても、この都市の運命は君の手中にある。\n\n敵軍の圧倒的な勢力に対抗する最後の兵士たちを支援し、救援軍の到着まで持ちこたえるのだ。野営地を築き、資源を管理し、支給品を制作して日中を過ごす。日が落ちたら、世闇にまぎれて陥落した市街を探索し、資源と新たな民間人の志願者を探し出せ。",accent_color:Mu,background_color:Mv,key_media_header:Mw,locale:dp,rating:a,show_quarterly:t,release_date:Mx,game_features:"- 包囲戦を生き延びろ\\\n残された都市を護るのは、疲れ果てた少数の部隊のみ。弓矢、武器、防具の不足は著しく、負傷者の手当も必要だ。防御要員たちが護る最後の要塞に物資を補給し、数日おきの交戦に備えて可能な限り支援する。さもなければ、敵軍がキープになだれ込んで来ることになる。それだけではなく、火矢の波や巨大な岩石の攻撃に繰り返し晒されている、民間人と野営地の防護も必要だ。\n- 資源を管理して支給品を制作\\\nより優れた武器、野営地、温かい食べ物など、生き延びるために最低限必要なものは、自分たちで制作しなければ手に入らない。しかも資源は限られ、兵士たちと民間人の両方に供給する必要がある。つまり、食料保存、インフラ開発、そして物資の一層効率的な使用法を考えなければならないのだ。\n- 陥落した市街で採集作業\\\n安全なキープから離れ、夜間は荒れ果てた市街を探索して貴重な資源を集め、生き残った民間人を助ける必要がある – あるいは、彼らを搾取してもいい。敵の警備隊が市街を見張っているから、見つからないよう注意して... 生き延びるのだ。他の地域へのルートをアンロックし、新たな民間人の志願者を集め、捕まらないよう夜明け前に戻ろう。\n- 城壁に追い込まれる\\\n救援軍は来るが、数週間も先だ。このような包囲戦では、一つのジレンマがすぐに飛び火し、厳しい人道的選択を迫られることになる。仲間と都市の運命は、君の手にかかっている。飢餓、負傷、病気、絶望。そして民間人と防御要員の間にも緊張が高まる。部隊を維持するか、民間人を護るか？君一人で決めるのだ。\n- 自分だけのストーリーを作ろう\\\nゲームエディタープラットフォーム上で開発された『Siege Survival: Gloria Victis』は、MODやコミュニティ・コンテンツの利用が可能だ。自分だけのユニークなシナリオやストーリーを作成して、「Gloria Victis」の世界観を拡大しよう。\n\n",testdate:a,show_yearly:t,hero_cutout:a,store_links:[{id:dr,system:a,url:My,store:a},{id:ds,system:a,url:aIl,store:a},{id:cS,system:a,url:aIm,store:a}],info:{id:CX,developer:Mz,players:M,offical_url:d},key_media:[{__component:u,id:cT,embed_code:FB}],media:[{__component:u,id:acp,embed_code:FB},{__component:l,id:604,image:{id:ge,name:BB,alternativeText:d,caption:d,width:r,height:q,formats:{thumbnail:{name:BC,hash:MA,ext:c,mime:b,width:k,height:m,size:MB,path:a,url:MC},large:{name:BD,hash:MD,ext:c,mime:b,width:j,height:p,size:ME,path:a,url:MF},medium:{name:BE,hash:MG,ext:c,mime:b,width:i,height:o,size:MH,path:a,url:MI},small:{name:BF,hash:MJ,ext:c,mime:b,width:f,height:n,size:MK,path:a,url:ML}},hash:MM,ext:c,mime:b,size:MN,url:MO,previewUrl:a,provider:e,provider_metadata:a,created_at:O,updated_at:O}},{__component:l,id:605,image:{id:gP,name:BG,alternativeText:d,caption:d,width:r,height:q,formats:{thumbnail:{name:BH,hash:MP,ext:c,mime:b,width:k,height:m,size:pD,path:a,url:MQ},large:{name:BI,hash:MR,ext:c,mime:b,width:j,height:p,size:MS,path:a,url:MT},medium:{name:BJ,hash:MU,ext:c,mime:b,width:i,height:o,size:MV,path:a,url:MW},small:{name:BK,hash:MX,ext:c,mime:b,width:f,height:n,size:MY,path:a,url:MZ}},hash:M_,ext:c,mime:b,size:M$,url:Na,previewUrl:a,provider:e,provider_metadata:a,created_at:O,updated_at:O}},{__component:l,id:606,image:{id:gk,name:BL,alternativeText:d,caption:d,width:r,height:q,formats:{thumbnail:{name:BM,hash:Nb,ext:c,mime:b,width:k,height:m,size:Nc,path:a,url:Nd},large:{name:BN,hash:Ne,ext:c,mime:b,width:j,height:p,size:Nf,path:a,url:Ng},medium:{name:BO,hash:Nh,ext:c,mime:b,width:i,height:o,size:Ni,path:a,url:Nj},small:{name:BP,hash:Nk,ext:c,mime:b,width:f,height:n,size:fT,path:a,url:Nl}},hash:Nm,ext:c,mime:b,size:Nn,url:No,previewUrl:a,provider:e,provider_metadata:a,created_at:O,updated_at:O}},{__component:l,id:607,image:{id:kY,name:BQ,alternativeText:d,caption:d,width:r,height:q,formats:{thumbnail:{name:BR,hash:Np,ext:c,mime:b,w Elle organise le concours de cuisine qui encourage le joueur et propose des plats créatifs et colorés comme les Gaufres arc-en-ciel, les Smoothies licorne, les Sushis burritos ou les Gâteaux à étages au pain perdu. \n\n**Les juges**\nLe critique, l'excentrique et la popstar : \nselon vos résultats, ces trois juges à la personnalité et aux goûts culinaires très différents vont soit encenser votre performance, soit émettre des critiques cinglantes. Saurez-vous les impressionner ?\n\n**Modes de jeu**\nÀ vos marques, prêt, PARTEZ ! Peaufinez vos talents de cuisinier dans divers modes de jeu.\nDéverrouillez de nouvelles préparations pour votre livre de recettes avec les Techniques de cuisine.\nImpressionnez les juges avec de la délicieuse nourriture dans le mode Recette simple.\nPrêt à relever un défi ? Gérez 3 recettes en même temps dans une session marathon dans le mode Tournoi combo. \nGrâce à la Partie rapide, vous pouvez préparer vos recettes préférées quand vous le voulez.\nCliché et partage de nourriture vous permet de prendre des photos de vos ravissantes créations et de les partager avec le monde. \n\n**Recettes**\nMaîtrisez des dizaines de techniques de cuisine et déverrouillez plus de 70 recettes uniques ! Impressionnez les juges avec des recettes de mets quotidiens ou de licorne magique comme le Chocolat chaud licorne. Vous n'êtes pas carnivore ? Pas de problème ! Yum Yum Cookstar propose à la fois la version d'un plat avec de la viande et sa déclinaison végétarienne.\n\n**Niveaux de difficulté**\nYum Yum Cookstar offre 4 niveaux de difficulté : relax, détendu, pro et cookstar. Profitez d'une session de cuisine tranquille ou relevez le défi pour devenir le prochain cookstar ! Avec les conseils de la cheffe Yum Yum, vous deviendrez rapidement un pro.\n\n**Commandes\u002FMécaniques**\nYum Yum Cookstar propose désormais des mini-jeux supplémentaires basés sur le rythme. Le tempo et le rythme sont la clé pour préparer un délicieux plat.  Tranchez, faites revenir, coupez, hachez les ingrédients et affinez vos talents culinaires dans plus de 40 mini-jeux Perfecciona tus habilidades culinarias en diferentes modos de juego.\nDesbloquea nuevas recetas para tu recetario en Técnicas culinarias.\nImpresiona a los jueces con platos deliciosos en el Modo receta única.\n¿Todo listo para afrontar un reto? Enfréntate a 3 recetas a la vez en una sesión de maratón en el Modo torneo combo. \nEn Partida rápida puedes cocinar tus recetas favoritas a tu antojo.\nFotos de comidas y compartir te permite hacer fotos a tus deliciosas creaciones y compartirlas con el mundo.\n \n**Recetas**\n¡Domina decenas de técnicas culinarias y desbloquea más de 70 recetas únicas! Impresiona a los jueces con delicias cotidianas o recetas de unicornio mágicas como el chocolate caliente de unicornio. ¿La carne no es lo tuyo? ¡No hay problema! Yum Yum Cookstar ofrece una versión carnívora de los platos y una variante vegetariana.\n\n**Ajustes de dificultad**\nYum Yum Cookstar ofrece 4 ajustes de dificultad: relajado, casual, profesional y cookstar. ¡Disfruta de una sesión culinaria relajada o acepta el desafío y conviértete en una auténtica estrella culinaria! Con los consejos de la Chef Yum Yum, te convertirás en todo un profesional en un santiamén.\n\n**Controles\u002Fmecánica**\nYum Yum Cookstar ahora ofrece minijuegos de ritmo adicionales. El tiempo y el ritmo son claves para cocinar un exquisito plato. È la curatrice della competizione di cucina che incoraggia il giocatore e presenta piatti colorati e creativi come i Waffle arcobaleno, i Frappè unicorno, i Burrito di sushi e la Torta French Toast a strati. \n\n**I giudici**\nIl critico, l’eccentrico e la popstar: \nTre giudici molto diversi tra loro, con gusti e opinioni diverse sul cibo che, a seconda dei tuoi risultati, loderanno la tua prestazione o esprimeranno aspre osservazioni. Riuscirai a stupirli?\n\n**Modalità di gioco**\nPronti, ai fuochi, VIA! Affina le tue abilità culinarie in varie modalità di gioco.\nSblocca nuove ricette per il tuo ricettario in Tecniche culinarie.\nStupisci i giudici con piatti deliziosi nella Modalità ricetta singola.\nAccetti la sfida? Prepara 3 ricette contemporaneamente in una sessione di maratona nella Modalità Torneo Combo. \nCon la funzione Partita veloce puoi cucinare le tue ricette preferite al volo.\nScatta e condividi ti permette di fotografare le tue deliziose creazioni per poterle condividere con il mondo. \n\n**Ricette**\nPadroneggia dozzine di tecniche culinarie e sblocca oltre 70 ricette originali! Stupisci i giudici con delizie quotidiane o ricette magiche di unicorno come la Cioccolata unicorno calda. Non sei amante della carne? Nessun problema! Yum Yum Cookstar offre sia una versione con piatti a base di carne che una variante vegetariana.\n\n**Impostazioni di difficoltà**\nYum Yum Cookstar presenta 4 livelli di difficoltà: Rilassata, Casual, Pro e Cookstar. Goditi una sessione di cucina senza stress o affronta una sfida per diventare anche tu una star dei fornelli! Sotto la guida della chef Yum Yum diventerai un professionista in men che non si dica.\n\n**Comandi\u002Fmeccanica**\nYum Yum Cookstar ora include minigiochi aggiuntivi basati sul ritmo. mining village of Northern Canada in 1970 and uncover the mystery of the bizarre mist - the brume - that has engulfed the region.","Northern Québec, 1970. A bizarre mist - the Brume - is disconnecting a rural mining village from its quiet reality and disrupting the balance of nature. But where is it coming from?\n\nStep back into the role of Detective Carl Faubert and dive deeper into the surreal mysteries of Kona.\n\nMake your trek through the snowy landscapes of Northern Canada and discover that you are not entirely alone. Find other stranded people - both victims and survivors of a devastating avalanche - and uncover the hidden dark truth of the Brume.\n","- Explore\nExplore the vast fictive land of Manastan in Northern Canada and fight your way through the village  - or what's left of it. Search for clues in wooden shacks, visit nearby locations on your trusty dog sled and navigate the surrounding lakes.\n- Investigate\nFollow your clues and findings very carefully. Consult Carl Faulbert's Journal and put your detective skills to the test. Can you piece together the mystery behind the brume?\n- Survive\nThe Brume is relentless: a bitter cold blizzard, dangerous wildlife and troubling nightmares. Prepare to survive against all odds.\n- Experience\nA rich story unfolds with every step you take. humanity - shape society","A society survival game set in world destroyed by climate change. Explore, scavenge and build a city to unite the clans. Conflicting cultures and limited resources mean you need to make tough choices; have you got what it takes to lead your people into a new era of humanity?","Unite Humanity - Shape Society\nThe climate change was a catalyst for a sucession of events that led to the destruction of our world; rising sea levels have innundated the coasts. Only you can help humanity survive by leading your band of survivors on a path to redemption. Starting with lost bunch of survivors, you need to scavange resources, rediscover technology and maintain the peace between differing factions as you strive to rebuild society.\n\nExplore and Exploit \nThe world - as you know it - has gone, replaced by islands, swamps and isolated groups of survivors. Gathering scarce resources, you need to explore the world - island by island - helping those you can and dealing with those who do not share your vision of the future.\n\nGrow Your Colony\nThere's more to a city than just people. Food, shelter, water, health security - the list is long and varied. Technology to be researched along a branching Tech-Tree, buildings upgraded and specalists to train. It's down to you to make sure all these needs are furfilled; a job made all the harder with limited resources, space and labour to complete these tasks.\n\nYou Are the Law\nA society is only as good as its laws; it's up to you to define them. Will you usher in a new utopian age of equality or is your future a benign dictatorship? Not every group shares your vision and the choices you make can have a profound impact on the future of your settlement. A common goal will make your society more productive than one at loggerheads with itself; you need to define and choose your legal evolution and which route to follow on the Law-Tree but - as with all things - there are always consequences.\n\nUnlimited Playthroughs\nEach game is different;  maps, events and makeup of the world are randomly generated, allowing unique playthroughs every time.
